inclusion.criterion: fully characterized refractory unifocal neocortical epilepsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: on a stable drug regimen for at least one month
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to complete a seizure dairy either by the patient or by a significant other
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Metal in the head including deep brain stimulators, aneurysmal clips, ventricular shunts, cochlear implants, ossicular reconstruction of the middle ear…
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability and CHF. He has been experiencing seizures with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking.
